data.Name: The Walters
data.Bio: The Walters passion and devotion for the rhythm & blues traditions of the mid 20th century, is evident in the fervour with which they perform their brand of rhythm, blues and soul. Narratives of life and love cast against a backdrop of soulful grooves and electrifying swings, delivered with a crazed enthusiasm thatâ€™s impossible to deny. Read more on Last.fm
